content:
I have started renaming FluentPath to FhirPath, which means that the github repository (fhir-net-fluentpath) has been renamed too. GitHub will redirect to the new name (fhir-net-fhirpath), but if you have a clone, please update your origin address to this new name.
The rename will undoubtably also cause compilation errors, since the assembly AND the namespace names will have to be changed as well....
Shouldn't be an issue in STU3, its a just a patient reference there too.
Won't be long till the Jan Connectathon version is realeased...
